14.text:
Welcome to illuminati silver, we tell you
the truth about silver.

19.text:
Today is Tuesday 8th November 2016 and Banks
are reporting that they are making preparations

26.text:
in the event of a Trump victory.
Global banks, including Morgan Stanley, JPMorgan

33.text:
Chase & Co and HSBC are bracing for potential
tumult on financial markets after today’s

41.text:
U.S. election.
The timing of the results means that Asian

46.text:
regional markets will the first to trade.
HSBC and Japan's Nomura Holdings are among

53.text:
institutions boosting staff levels, while
others are raising the margin requirements

59.text:
for trading to cope with a possible spike
in volume or volatility.

66.text:
In the United States, Morgan Stanley told
staff to consider using stop-loss orders,

73.text:
an automated trading mechanism that sells
an investor's position as soon as a stock

78.text:
hits a preset level, if the result causes
trading volumes and volatility to spike.

86.text:
TD Ameritrade are lining up its consultants
to advise their clients; Kim Hillyer, its

93.text:
spokeswoman said:
"When the markets move, it can be difficult

98.text:
to put emotion at bay and stick to your plan,"
Traders expect U.S. stock prices to swing

106.text:
by around 2% in either direction on Wednesday,
the day after the election, based on the price

114.text:
of S&P 500 index options.
Some banks are projecting a more extreme drop

122.text:
in the event of a victory for Republican Donald
Trump, with Citigroup Inc estimating that

128.text:
a Trump victory could trigger a 3% - 5% percent
sell-off for the S&P 500. We believe it could

136.text:
easily reach the 5% level.
The rise in most of the world’s stock market

143.text:
indices today of between 0.5% and 1% suggests
at least that they believe Clinton will win.

151.text:
However with all of these preparations they
have put in place, this proves they are not

159.text:
that certain.
We hope you have found this video interesting

164.text:
and informative and if so, please give it
a thumb up and share it on twitter. Also kindly

170.text:
visit our website at illuminatisilver.com
and if you haven’t already done so please

175.text:
subscribe as a free member for regular email
updates and offers. Our Facebook page which

182.text: is updated daily can be found at facebook.com/illuminatisilver

187.text:
Illuminati Silver owners come from a background
of Banking, International Wealth Management

195.text:
and Economics. Having now retired from these
worlds we are not qualified to give investment

200.text:
advice. Therefore, this and other productions
must not be deemed to be giving such advice

204.text:
and merely represent the personal views of
